relevant_findings.general: No acute distress (NAD), alert and oriented to person, place, and time (AAOx3), pleasant and conversant (daughter translating)
relevant_findings.heart: Regular rate and rhythm (RRR), no murmurs, rubs, or gallops (MRG), normal S1 and S2
relevant_findings.lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally (CTA b/l), no respiratory distress
relevant_findings.abdomen: Normal bowel sounds (nbs), soft, appropriately tender to palpation near port sites, no rebound, no guarding, obese, mild distention
